titleStmt.title: A waying and considering of the Interim by the honourworthy and highly learned Phillip Melancthon. Tra[n]slated into Englyshe by Iohn Rogers
Bedencken suffs Interim. English
titleStmt.author: Melanchthon, Philipp, 1497-1560.
Rogers, John, 1500?-1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne ouer against the conduite by Edwarde Whitchurche,
publicationStmt.date: the vi. daie of Auguste, the yere of our lorde. M.D.XLVIII.] [1548]

notesStmt.note: A translation, by John Rogers, of: Melanchthon, Philipp. Bedencken suffs Interim.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
